cosmos noun
(PLANT)
[ C or U ] plural cosmos a plant grown in gardens for its brightly coloured flowers, which are produced for a long period : Cosmos seeds are easy to plant and grow and will get your gardening off to a great start. In summer, sunflowers and cosmos brightened the roadside.
